title: Coronavirus, NBA season, NFL draft, Dak Prescott
itunes:title: Coronavirus, NBA season, NFL draft, Dak Prescott
description:
Colin discusses the NBA season going on without fans, why it must return soon, why the NFL draft not being pushed back is the right call, Dak Prescott possibly becoming the highest paid player in the league, and the effect the Coronavirus is having on all of us. Guests include Ryen Russillo, Mark Cuban, Joe Buck, Joe Looney, and Jason McIntyre.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
